H0.text: The Battle of Vimy Ridge took place in which country during World War l. Belgium

H1.text: The Battle of Vimy Ridge took place in which country during World War l. Germany

H2.text: The Battle of Vimy Ridge took place in which country during World War l. Poland

H3.text: The Battle of Vimy Ridge took place in which country during World War l. FRANCE

A4.text: The Battle of Vimy Ridge was part of the Battle of Arras, in the Pas-de-Calais department of France.
